name: Elliott Morgan
text: Great store. Constantly making improvements, and renovations. Good pricing on all of its products.

name: Jakemansayz
text: And the awesome place to get an nerdgasm

name: Megan Morgan
text: Great people, management, and inventory.

name: MrPrrplehaze974
text: Great atmosphere. Friendly staff. A great selection of games and collectables ranging from present to vintage. They also host many events from FNM to D&D.

resp.text: We appreciate you! Thanks for coming to visit us and we hope to see you again soon!

name: Rev. David Bailey
text: They have everything you can imagine.!  Love looking at the items

name: Ryan Lonnergan
text: My group and I have been looking for a place to play and there has been no place more accommodating than GG Comics. This place is truly one of the best places that I've been to in a long time.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Glad y’all are having such a great time!

name: Matthew McClendon
text: Great place, great people and great prices

name: Derek Jman
text: Nice environment, great staff, good people

name: Tony Hulsey
text: Selection is small. The person that was working the store during my visit was very polite, and answered my child's questions with awesome patience and treated her like an individual and not just a little kid. Will return to this location.

name: Jonathan Cassidy
text: They have a great selection of classic consoles and video games. I'm not into comics but they have a large selection of those along with toys and trading cards/magic the gathering cards. The owner also said they planned on setting up a game room where you can play/test games.

name: John Tipler
text: Fantastic comic book store. They also have Magic the Gathering, video games, and toys. The guys working there are courteous and knowledgeable. Go by and see them!

name: Patrick T.
text: Fun atmosphere, great selections and comeditive prices for cards, and every Friday they welcome all players to use their backroom to play games of Magic! Had so much fun!!

name: Robert Beasley
text: Friendly staff and tons of good dollar boxes of comics.

name: Omen-13 (Viibrams)
text: Awesome store. Only reason why i didnt 5 star is because 90% of their stuff doesnt have a price on it.

name: Wade Parris
text: Really cool collectibles great atmosphere the guys that run this place knows there stuff and you can find really cool stuff for affordable prices

name: ASeaFaringLlama
text: Awesome store with friendly staff!

name: Alisa Bailey
text: Very organized, friendly staff

name: Shannon Davis
text: Awesome

name: Justin Malachii Dutton
text: Cool

name: Cole Malden
text: I bought 15 comics from them about 2 months ago. Today I tried to bring them back to sell so I can pick up some more and they wouldn't even give me half of what I paid them for the very same comics. I'll never shop at this store again, thieves and snakes 💯

name: Payton Rogers
text:
Lonnie (the owner) is incredibly knowledgeable about all things comics. He has a wide selection of very well taken care of single issues and a growing trade paper back library of all kinds. He's always willing to try and order anything for you if you can't find what you're looking for.

Finally, the most important thing to me in a comic shop, this is the perfect shop to just swing by and chat about geekdom. It's an awesome welcoming well laid out store. Hands down the best place on Mobile Bay to buy comics.

name: Jon Levin
text: The best comic shop I saw in Mobile or Fairhope and there were a few good ones. Owner is fair and offers you a reasonable price and respects his local clientele.

name: Andrew Anastasia
text: They were very friendly and informative. Prices were great

name: Scott Hill
text: Wonderful small comic shop.  Great selection.  The staff is friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful.

name: Dave
text: Met the owner and he helped me find several issues that I was missing. He also recommended a few things I was missing out on. Very friendly and helpful! I highly recommend visiting Covert Comics!!

name: Ernest Bentley
text: Friendly,  knowledgeable staff that makes you feel welcome. Great selections.

name: K2 Nelson
text: The people are so friendly and helpful. They have so many great comics!

name: Donnie Edwards
text: Both shops are great places to go to

name: Marcos Almonte Perez
text: What a gem! This is a must see; must stop Comic Book + store in Huntsville just off Route 53 (Jordan Lane). Comic book galore. Lego characters. Star Wars memorabilia including The Mandalorian. My kids love it!

name: Dillon Lee
text: The best toy store in North Central Alabama. Excellent displays and atmosphere. Knowledge, friendly, welcoming staff, something sorely lacking in other area comic and collectible store. Truly excellent selection of 2010s era 3 3/4 inch GI Joe figures, 25th anniversary figures, as well as vintage vehicles. The largest Carded Master of the Universe Classics collection I have ever seen in person. My highest recommendation.

resp.text: Dillon,  thank you so much for the amazing review!

name: Linda Alford
text: This place is so cool! Loads of comics, I had a blast looking through everything. The lady in the shop was super nice and knowledgeable too. I'll definitely be back for more!

resp.text: Hey Linda,  thank you so much for the amazing review. Enjoyed chatting with you!

name: Robert Burdette
text: This comic shop is awesome! They had so many items and were so friendly. Whenever Liam and I come through Huntsville, we will definitely stop by! Thanks for the amazing service and wonderful conversation!

resp.text: Robert... we truly enjoyed you and Liam visiting today!  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Edward Gaffket
text: Visiting from out of town and i would recommend coming here for all your comic and geek needs. Had a lot of the comics i was looking for, even some variants.

name: rylan Laird
text: Very nice collection of comics and action figures, this is the place to go if you're looking for older GiJoes, I will definitely be back. The staff was also very nice.

name: Hismione Tremblay
text: Really nice.  The owner was very friendly.

name: COOKZ 24 *FBT*
text: Excellent place for comic lovers and very clean and spacious

name: Whitney G
text: This place is amazing! The owner is so friendly and knowledgeable about everything in the store and we always have a super amazing experience!

name: Justin Gage
text: Great comic shop with a great atmosphere!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!

name: Sarah Potvin
text: Great store! Reasonably priced! We will be back

resp.text: Hi Sarah. Thanks so much for the great review!  We will see you again soon😁

name: Brandon Atchley
text: My favorite Comic shop in the Huntsville area

resp.text: Thanks Brandon!

name: Brittany Schrimsher
text: Cute little place with very nice staff!

resp.text: Thanks Brittany!  Appreciate your support!

name: Josh Harbin
text: Awesome place!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: BasketCase 420
text: We showed up at 11 o'clock and there were no cars  the doors were closed in spite of the sign saying it should have been open.

name: Jennifer Remnet
text: Amber is the bomb. Very personable and friendly.  My kids love stopping in the store to see the new bobble heads.

resp.text: Thanks Girl for the great review! 💜

name: Jon Holt
text: This store is awesome! Lots of comics, figures, games, the whole nine yards!! Super friendly people as well! Pretty good prices as well

resp.text: Thanks Jon for the great review!  We really appreciate it and so glad you like the store!

name: Heather Moore
text: Awesome Staff

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Lance Sprain
text: Owner is really nice & helpful And a great selection is an understatement!

resp.text: Thanks Lance! Great chatting with you this evening... Appreciate the great review!

name: Freeway B Ray
text: Great store to come and just play games. Never pressed me to spend but instead asked me to feel free to sit and play games.

name: Jon Lewis
text: They started selling buld a figures for great prices.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: iiLightningStarii Jinx (Dont Jinx the Star.)
text: Great store it's amazing here your welcome here anytime

resp.text: Thanks for the great review. We really appreciate you!

name: jon lewis
text: Good place I love comic books

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review. Really appreciate it!

name: Anthony Bonetti
text: Great place to shop.  Every time I go in there, the staff is always helpful and friendly.  Never had a bad experience at FOS.  Dan will go out of his way to get me what I need, and always makes me a good deal so we both walk away happy.  Ronnie is always friendly and helpful, and I thoroughly enjoy talking/complaining about the latest storylines with him.  They even help my wife buy me gifts for holidays so she knows she is getting me what I will like 😀.  Great selection, knowledgable and friendly staff, can't recommend FOS Comics enough!

name: Man vs. Rock
text: Awesome spot! Got to get them comics son! Like my personal favorite: Indie Comic of the Year - Man Vs. Rock!!!

name: lava cannon
text: The workers are extremely nice and I really enjoyed the set up of the store. I intend to go back frequently.

name: Tessa Rose
text: Great shop! Wonderful selection and staff

name: Veldel
text: Great staff and very welcoming.

name: Batmatt Thunder
text: Your not a customer your a friend.

name: Marshall Johnson
text: Lots of selection and cheap.

name: Kea Theroux, LMSW (OreoRocks)
text:
More of a gaming store, from the outside you can't even tell they have comics. This isn't even the name listed on the building.

Free comic book day --- huge disappointment. No celebration of what they are supposed to sell.

name: Caywood Kerstin
text: The store is very nice. The owner and his team are always helpful and attentive to the customers. They make you feel welcome and encourage to hang out, play some games and enjoy your time there. Amazing store for sure

name: art dominguez
text: Awesome game store / comic book store. I had the opportunity of stopping into Fanatix while visiting my son at Fort Rucker and had the pleasure of meeting the owners and speak with them for a bit. While I was there I picked up a couple of games and looked around the store. The back of the store is awesome! They have it setup for tabletop gaming with all sorts of terrain for Warhammer or Star Wars Legion. Also if you get a chance to stop in ask about their exclusive card game "How to Kill a Spider". It's a neat and fun little card game the owners created and got funded from Kickstarter.

name: Chad Leuci
text:
Great place, and so thankful that they do Fanaticon. They were lovely and are assisting me with getting my cosplay registered.

Though I wish they would be a bit of gaming stuff (small scale tournaments would be cool) they don't really have a need or reason to, and tournaments can get a bit pricey.

All around great place.

(the hours are a bit weird though but whatever)

name: shadowreaper
text: Very friendly nice staff and good place to meet other people who are into stuff like MTG or WarHammer or other stuff like that

name: Nicholas Boutwell
text: Great place to game! Staff are friendly and very knowledgeable.

name: Lori Fry
text: Friendly, accommodating staff, great games and events, nice selection. More than meets the eye.

name: Neko Madison
text: Friendly staff and great selection. They also do special orders. Highly recommend it!

name: Valvazork
text: Would have enjoyed it even more if I knew how to read

name: Dominic Williams
text: The place have things I love

name: Neal Duffy
text: Small but has a friendly atmosphere. Great place for some family gaming

name: Stacy Brand
text: Friendly neighborhood comic book store. Reasonable rates to rent a private room for tabletop games

name: June Jones
text: Great community, full of nice people always willing to help with whatever hobby you're in to. (Also the best magic the gathering community around)

name: Bradley Johnson
text: Always friendly to new customers, great place to feed your hobby or pick up a new one

name: Manic Motivation
text: Great store with multiple locations. Wonderful staff knowledgeable about their diverse product range.

name: Carl Cedarstaff II
text: Friendly.  Helpful.  They are my people

name: Hannah Leland
text: Great people work there and they have almost anything nerdy that you need. Plus if you want to play DnD they have certain nights where you can

name: Chad Raffield
text: Great place and an amazing staff. I didn't visit here for a year but, when I walked in last, the manager still remembered my full name and treated me like a regular. This store is also located in a perfect part of Enterprise.

name: Nick Hoc
text: Great little game store that offers a large amount of space for competitive games or other table top games. They carry a large set of different hobbies as well as comics.

name: Syran Austin
text: This is a great place for gamers to meet other like minded individuals. They support the gaming community and provide an atmosphere that is welcoming to gamers from all genres.

name: Inquisitor Jones
text: Great people great place and just the right amount of Admech

name: Azeala Hutchinson
text: Cool place!!  Stop by and check it out for yourself.

name: Chris Hoage
text: Nice game stove.

name: Caleb
text: Nice staff that are eager to help out inexperienced customers.

name: Jackie Newsome
text: Great place to play games and books. They have card tournaments and other games.

name: Joseph Marrero
text: I love this place they are great people and wonderfully patient ..

name: Larry Petrie
text: Great place and employees.  Every person in store for fnm is helpful and enjoyable

name: Sarah Arce
text: Fun and exciting sucks it rained today

name: Eli Tingey
text: Great store, friendly staff, THE place to go for Magic & other card games, Comics, Table top games like 40k, X-wing, Bolt Action, etc.

name: Jeremy (Jackal City)
text: Always do their best to help hobbiests with their hobbies.

name: Khari Butler
text: Great store, great service, I can definitely say.

name: Roger Jones
text: Awesome store with plenty of gaming space and an active tournament scens

name: braveguy 79
text: Nice folks clean store competitive players

name: D Mab
text: Awesome shop that is welcoming to everyone that comes in!

name: Jonathon Broadhead
text: Super friendly and helpful staff!

name: AL Rachels
text: Great place to shop and play.

name: Julie Parker
text: Not all what I expected. Sorta a let down

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback. As we are always trying to improve can you leave a brief explanation on your experience?

name: Chris Austin
text: Great place!

name: Shelby DiPilla
text: Cool place

name: Kyle Johnson
text: Friendly atmosphere

name: Thomas Allen
text: Cool staff, great comunity!

name: Dorothy Clay
text: Awesome

name: Teresa Jenkins
text: Very friendly!

name: John Dietz
text: Lots of fun

name: Dave Jones
text: Great shop, would highly recommend

name: Gloria Holmes
text: Love it

name: Myroan Brown
text: Great Entertainment

name: Timothy Senn
text: Really cool place

name: Carlos Rivera
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good attention

(Original)
Muy buena atención

name: Matt McCombs
text:
Great shop, very friendly and helpful staff.  The staff conducts and participates in gaming with anyone that wants to join.  All customers that walk through the door are greeted with a smile and and a welcome.

They are more than willing to help with any request for books, games and collectibles.

name: Krystal Bost
text: Great bunch of local weirdos to help with all your weirdo needs. Gaming, comics, magic cards, t shirts, they've got it all. And they are nice. Except Drew. Just kidding. But not really. But a little. Maybe it's just me. :)

name: Dustin Arnold
text: Today physical issues are a rare thing. Great local service with a helpful staff and selection.

name: Mike Molino
text: Terrible selection, THE WORST customer service. This place is the worst "comic" store I have ever walked in. Bought 40 bucks worth of comics, paid with a 100 dollar bill and the idiot acts like he didn't wanna take it, crinkles it up, stares at it and finally says "yea alright" and ACTS SAD for some reason. Mommy and daddy should shut your store down.

name: _ JasonIsCrazy (‪JasonIsCrazy‬)
text: This is a friendly place with helpful employees and they have really good prices

name: Tyler Johnson
text: Although I love this place they are now officially closed

name: James Moore
text: Very nice people who have a good time.

name: Kyle Nunn
text: Simply the best place to get your geek fix.

name: Vilishkumar Patel
text: best place for area gaming and cards

name: Matt Nabors
text: Games, comics, and a community that I am proud to be a part of.

name: jolt06
text: Very friendly

name: Leon Archer
text: Super friendly

name: Brian Macdonald
text: Great comic store.  The father and son are great guys and true comic book lovers.   If you get the chance check out the place.  Going there made my day.  I’ll be stopping in every time I pass Birmingham when I travel

name: Hani Blake Dabbas
text: Fantastic shop full of old school greatness.  If you are into silver and bronze age comics, then Saturday vintage is the shop for you

resp.text: Thank you Blake - You are an awesome customer

name: Michael Knight
text: GREAT SHOP

name: angrykoolaidman
text: Really great hidden gem shop. Well worth the 35-minute drive to check it out. I was pleasantly surprised by the back issues available. Mostly mid to high grade Silver and Bronze age stuff, all competitively priced. I'll definitely be going back.

name: Jay Thurston
text: Wonderful selection and a terrific owner.  Really amazing books.

name: John Tipler
text: This is probably the best comic book shop I've ever been in. If you're looking for high end comics this is the place in Northeast Alabama. I've been collecting for a couple decades, and I've seen comics here I've never seen anywhere else. Open 10-5 on Saturday. Any other time you need an appointment. Make an appointment. It's worth it to your collection.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review - I wish I could leave positive reviews for outstanding customers like you. Thank you for stopping by.

name: Marcus Lusk
text: Outstanding shop! Great selection, clean, organized and friendly service! As we all know, it's not often you find all these attributes together in a comic shop! Well worth devoting your Saturday to a visit!

resp.text: Thank you very much - it is a pleasure to have great customers like you as well.

name: Shawna Randall
text: Jay always has great stuff at great prices...you won't meet a nicer guy!

name: C M Hughes
text: Old comics great customer service

name: Kyle Jackson
text: Nice, local vintage comic shop in Leeds, AL with lots of gems to find whether you are a serious or just a beginning collector.

resp.text: It is great to have wonderful customers.

name: Josh Roberie
text: Very friendly, clean store, lots of key issues. Wide selection and great prices.

name: Lucas Craig
text: Knowledgeable employees in a vibrant atmosphere. Great local shop for trading cards, board games, comic books, graphic novels , retro video games, toys and collectibles. One stop shop for all your geeky and nerdy needs.

name: Julie Corley
text: Extremely friendly and knowledgable staff.  Very helpful with advice and recommendations if you are fairly new to comics or shopping for someone else who is into comic books.  I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: robert hindi
text: Best local place to play TCGs, great group of MTG players. Employees are always very friendly and helpful. Prices are great and they offer a rewards program.

name: William Brown
text: Great staff! Very knowledgeable and very friendly. They are extremely helpful and living talking about comic's!

name: April Myers
text: Great selection of both mainstream and indie comics. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Greg Bowen
text:
This is a great little shop with a top notch staff.  Theyve been good to me since day 1 ,which is why I still maintain my pull with them.

Definitly give Quality Comix a visit!

name: KillerRrampage1157
text: the staff is great they know me by name they know what characters i like in both the DC and Marvel universe and they know how to give you great experience

name: Donald LaPointe
text:
THEE best comic book store in the River Region.  Yes, even better than their Montgomery location.

Extremely friendly and knowledgeable staff.  If you can't find it in their huge selection of individual issues, trade paperbacks, hard covers, statues, action figures, card games, etc., they will find it and get it for you (if it is still available).

The fact that this store is downtown (what I like to call "Old Towne Prattville") adds to its charm.

This is a great brick and mortar compliment for "modern" comics to their web site for "classic" (as in pre-1970) offerings.

name: Layla Navarre
text: A great staff that loves to chat and help you find what you want, and they have a nice collection from every publisher to sift through.

name: Ronny Gweilo
text: Service, staff and merchandise. All great!

name: Shannon Plummer
text: They have alot of options here. Comic's, figures and such!!

name: Slick Gaming
text: I always like coming to the comic store. Friendly people, friendly town. A comic readers' hangout too. :)

name: Adam Broxson
text: Good ppl

name: jj mcgrady
text: Quality comix

name: BB AP
text: Awesome!

name: Tracy Caswell
text: Really nice down home country boys helped me out. Friendly and warm.

name: Chris Adams
text:
Great place for card or comic collectors
Prices are on par with others

name: andrew pilkanis
text: Great atmosphere and family friendly!! I always take my son here for comics every week.great selection on comics collectibles and various card collecting! Highly recommend to anyone!!!

name: Amanda Gail
text: Great place, lots of neat items! Watch out taking little ones though, it is a little crowded.

name: Evil Adams
text: large selection of new n old bookz lotz of go00oDstuff 2pick thru find sum go00oDshjit

name: ReD RuM
text: Excellent shop! Best in town and a wide variety of things to choose from sports cards to nonsport items as well. Mike, the owner is a great guy!!! A must see visit for loyal collectors of any spectrum in the hobby of collecting!!!

name: Wesley Rhodes
text: Great owner, reasonable prices for cards! Lots of options for budgets of all sizes, new collectors and old.

name: Kent Archer
text: Generally, I am a bargain hunter. I found a couple of items in the quarter bin and filled several gaps out of his 50-cent bin before looking through his Amazing Spiderman section. It was a lot of fun. There was no pressure. I really enjoyed the time there.

name: D reynoso
text: Best place to get comics, comics, you name it when it comes to collectables. And the owner is awesome! He knows his stuff. He was a history teacher he said lol. Highly recommended!

name: Valerie M Price
text: To be the only art and crafts supply store withing a 60 mile radius it seems the prices could be a little more reasonable,  they used to be then they went up on everything now I cant even afford to make my holiday items i usually make and sale cause I'd have to charge way to much to make my money back much less any profit.

name: Jeremy Belin
text: Prices are marked on items but then runs to the internet to raise them higher. Poor business and management!!

name: McNerdy Axolotls and Adventures
text: They don't have new Comics, they only carry back issues. Store is in disarray but they have a little bit of everything. Really good prices on silver and bronze age

name: Thomas Bell
text: I good place to get the thing you need

name: Shannon Davis
text: Great Place with great service

name: Thomas Clayon
text: Its mainly a baseball card shop but they have a ton of comics as well. Priced low to fair. Excellent shop.

name: Trey50Daniel
text: The owner is really nice and there's a great selection of trading cards and comics.

name: Michael Smith
text: Mike is a great guy and has a fantastic shop! A+ place all around!

name: Cctrapper 2
text: Great hobby shop

name: Sean Smith
text: A lot to look at, but just a little cramped

name: Robert Beasley
text: A comic nerds treasure trove, would love to have time to dig around.

name: Christopher “Skiandclimb” Kühn
text: Great comic shop! Excellent Silver Age selection, and Mike is a very nice guy!

name: John Tipler
text: If you're looking for high end comics, this is the place in North Alabama.

name: Brian Garrard (NutButterSkippy)
text: Always a pleasure.

name: Danielle Reynolds
text: Great card shop

name: Bobby Mullins
text: Love this store

name: Teresa Sitz
text: I got a 1821 dime for 32$

name: R!OT Fuze
text: Mike is really nice good cards and comics

name: Kirb Hicks
text: Not enjoyable

name: Greg Hamlin
text: Good selection on boxes

name: Michael Mangham
text: Love it

name: Chris Adams
text: Great place for sports card collectors

name: MrNatural Wade
text: Good selection of comics, cards and accessories!

name: Tariq Ruffin
text: Have a good volume of collectibles there

name: John Moody
text: Great place. Great people. Mark is top on my list of shop owners who really connect with people. All around Great

name: Jacob Burrell
text: Very helpful staff. Friendly and knowledgeable! Will be using them again!

name: Thomas Smith
text: I love buds place. Great games,great friends. It's the one thing I do for myself every week

name: Courtney Campbell
text: Always fun to go here every Saturday i really enjoy it

name: roger crossgrove
text: Said open 3 times. Visited 5 hours before closing 3 times. Closed 3 times.

name: Dustin Caston
text: Great place for hobby supplies

name: Ethan Forrest
text: Great place, we went there to play games, had a wonderful time!

name: Grillenheimer
text: Small yet they have a ton of cards, games and accessories.  Super nice owner.  They even sell Transformers deck boxes!  But no boosters.  They even have the large top loaders for characters like Omega Supreme, Fort Max, Metroplex and Trypticon for only $1.  Rooms upstairs and multiple tables downstairs for game play.  Parking can be an issue but Leeds doesn't have that much traffic.

name: Joshua French
text: Bud's Place Games is the place for table top games in Leeds. They have events, free private rooms, and a great selection of games of all types to buy. If they don't have it they are more than willing to try and order it for you and it is almost always at least comparable to Amazon, sometimes it is even cheaper.

name: SadMoonBeam
text: I order cards online from them and pick up in store, super easy and convenient. Saves me time and waiting for cards from eBay. I highly recommend more people use this, so more cards can be put in the online store. Buds place is also a great place to play table top rpg games, with plenty of room to play.

name: Rick Goudeau
text: A great place for playing games and to get your games and cards. Nice selection of games to choose.  My FLGS with the emphasis on Friendly. Love having my weekly game night there.

name: Stephanie Newman
text: We go to Bud's at least two times a month. Great place to game and the people are great.

name: Chris McCormick
text: Hands down the best place for gaming and your gaming needs. Owner is incredibly friendly and offers the best prices around coupled with the best gaming environment around! Love this place and wouldn’t go anywhere else!

name: Andrew Thomas
text: Good place. These guys are very accommodating to the table top gaming community.

name: Mark
text: Great game store - awesome range of boardgames and plenty of space.

name: Seth Hiatt
text: Great store!  Mark is a great guy and really knows his stuff!

name: Nicholas Toth
text: Really great staff. They actually care and want to see people happy.

name: Serendipity Awaits
text: Big fan of Bud's place!! This was my 1st visit in 4 plus years.  They've made some awesome improvements!! The store seems more family friendly and they have tons and tons of tabletop games to encourage family time at home!!

name: Lynn Culpepper
text: An awesome place for gaming and socializing with your geeky friends.  It is the BEST place for buying or selling MAGIC singles.  They are fair and honest.  They have air conditioning, bathrooms, snacks and cold drinks, and A LOT of tables for whatever game you want to play!

name: Adora Scruggs
text: Very friendly and helpful staff and good selection of items. There are also nice rooms upstairs to have separate games going at the same time.

name: Justin Moorer
text: I have been coming to this store for the last 2 years. The owner is very helpful and seems upbeat.  I found this place through my best friend and have been coming here ever since.  The staff is wonderful and the game choices are really excellant.  Kudos to the owner and the staff for making this my place to hang out on lunch from work or just to go during the week and weekend.  Friday Night Magic is one of their busiest nights!

name: Michael Streufert
text: The guys here are amazing with my kids and very helpful.  They host assorted tournaments every week.  There are a lot of tables to play on and they have a loaner library of games you can try out.  I have known these guys for a long time and enjoy visiting.  Bud's Place is very prompt to reply to Facebook messeges.  I cannot say enough nice things about this place.

name: John Sotiropoulos
text: Awesome.  Pokeman, Magic the gathering, Yu-Gi-Oh are played frequently.  They buy cards.  Crowded every weekend.

name: greatcornholio
text: Its rare to find people who love what they do as much as the guys here seem to. They are honest and hard working and will do their best to get you the best deal. Its by far the best place I have found to get Magic the gathering singles even cheaper than you can find them on eBay. If you're ever in leeds and a gamer you should stop in and see what you've been missing out on.

name: Jesse Sierke
text: I had a great time here playing games with awesome people. The staff were supportive of my needs, and the selection of items for my game (D&D Adventurers League) was pretty good. I'd love to help them set up some display tables for wargaming, but I understand that space is a premium.

name: Roland Garofalo
text: I have not visited their physical location, but I must say their customer service is phenomenal. A few months back I ordered some MTG cards online that came through their store. Unfortunately, the cards never shipped due to a processing error, no big deal. I gave 'em a call, and they immediately put all their effort into fixing the error and sending me the cards. AND they also included some foil promos in the package that were worth way more than the cards I purchased originally. It's great to see a LGS that truly supports their customers. If you are in the area, I highly recommend checking them out.

name: adam ledbetter
text: Great store! Always a good experience when I go here.

name: patrick tatum
text: I’ve been a regular for years. Mark is one of the most kindest and caring store owners I’ve ever met. Matt Johnson the Gen. manager is a professional and keeps a tight ship as well as he works with customers.

name: Aaron
text: Have generally always had good experiences here.

name: M M G
text: Great selection of board games and card games. Drove 30 miles to check the store out, wasn't disappointed at all.

name: Brian Graves
text: Best game store in town.  The owner genuinely cares about his customers and will stay open late just for the players to enjoy sometimes.   Very fair on pricing and the best selection of products around.

name: Ian McPherson
text: Nice small shop. Plenty of space for playing really anything. There are private rooms upstairs for dnd or boardgames.

name: Morgan Pendley
text: Absolutely wonderful shop, one of the best in the Birmingham area. Extremely friendly owner and staff, by far the best service around. Good selection of product, everything from MTG to board games.

name: thomas hames
text: Always a great place to game.

name: Captain England
text: Best place I've ever been to for games. Great for Magic, Pokemon, and Vanguard card games. Nowhere else is as good for Board games, manager is extremely knowledgeable. Has multiple rooms/areas for board gaming, rpgs, or  anything the like.

name: timothy dumas
text: This store is pretty amazing. I've been going weekly for two years and the Owner Mark is exactly what you want for this type of store. He is upbeat, honest, hard working and willing to help you out if he can. their prices for mtg are going to be the lowest in the birmingham area because of his pricing system. he has all the standard cards in binders so you can flip through at your convenience,with a lap top connected to his store sitting right beside them so you can check his stock online just as fast as he can. he has two glass cases with his more expensive cards which are organized like they should be by color, white, blue, black, red, green and artifact followed by lands. and also by format, standard, modern, legacy, commander. If you never have been before it is worth your time if you're close to stop in and say hey and look around. Thanks for the great store Mark!

name: Tanner Buckley
text: This is a really good place with a lot of good cards. They have very good prices and knowledgeable. I wish that they got more attention then what they do!

name: Louis Frohock
text: An excellent shop, one of the best in the state. The friendliest owner and staff, the sweetest service around. Great selection of product, everything from card games to board games.

name: Jacob Lee
text: Matt and Alex are super awesome. The atmosphere is fantastic and they assist however they can. Will be back starting next week!

name: Kevin Cassidy
text: Decent little shop, very friendly service, and great prices and availability. Came in looking for some card sleeves, deck box, storage box, and possibly a few single Yu-Gi-Oh cards. He had all of the above, including a computer for ordering cards on their own website, then receiving them in only 15-20 minutes (their warehouse was right up the street). Place was very lively and busy with players too.

name: Rachel Kendrick
text: It's fun, everyone is very friendly, and it's local.

name: Shawn Temple
text: Best prices I've found in Alabama by far, below TCGplayer Mid price. Great selection, very organized, amazing owner. Parking isn't the best but I've been at worse places. If you're in the area check it out!

name: Vivian Downs
text: Home sweet home!! My boyfriend and I were looking for a place to play Magic after Mad Doctor in Birmingham closed. We had tried another that really just didn't cut it, and then  friend of ours told us we should really come here. Instantly I felt at home. I made friends fast and the owner takes good care of his customers. He helps them with all of their needs and works with them when he needs to to give them the best experience he can. I just recently got into Heroclix, and Bud's has the friendliest heroclix community around!! I love this place, and support it as much as I can!

name: Sherri Anderson
text: I had a lot of fun playing Dungeons and Dragons there. Also, they've got a nice selection of comics, games, and toys.

name: aj goble
text: the staff is very friendly and helpful and the selection is great. there are also always new events going on and something fun to do.

name: Lane Miller
text: Great staff, good environment, a little cramped during big events.

name: Ryan Herrin
text: Helpful and friendly staff with a great selection of games and cards with plenty of room for gaming.

name: og LiquidDeath
text: Great people great customer service always!!! I love this place!!!

name: Brad Milburn
text: Nice variety of games and variety of heroclix singles. Was there for Winter WKO, event was ran really well.

name: Doug Schaefers
text: Despite it's small size it does carry a large variety of games and gaming supplies. Plus, if they don't have it in stock they can order it and have it in store in no time.

name: Keaton Abernathy
text: Friendly staff, excellent events, and fun games. What more could you want from a game store?

name: 94shadowolf
text: Great place,amazing shop, super friendly staff, and an amazing selection of all tcgs.

name: Sirens Final Gift
text: Great place for everyone from hard core gamers to new people just starting

name: Alexander Nathan Bailey
text: People were polite and helpful. Overall had a great time and experience.

name: Novapierce 1
text: Good service with a friendly atmosphere in a quaint little shop . A bit out of the way but definitely  one I'd recamend.

name: Shai White
text: Great place for gamers to hang out and meet more of the board and card gaming community!

name: Rosemarie Stipati
text: Great staff. Fun place to play D & D Adventures League.

name: Mega Dic
text: I was introduced to magic not long ago and fond this store not long after. Just the other day I walk in hoping to have my first magic match, but with my luck no one was even there playing magic. Luckily the owner, Mark, told me to go get my cards. He stomped me, but thought me so much about magic and I had a blast!

name: Sherman Deal
text: Friendly and safe place to go and you card or board games

name: Metal Dad1318
text: Great place to game and meet new people.

name: Rose Stipati
text: Great selection of board games. Friendly & knowledgeable staff.

name: Keith Wideman
text: Awesome store.  Very helpful staff.

name: Patrick Isbell
text: Great place for MTG, tournaments thurs fri and sat and easy to pick up commander games.

name: Michael Berryhill
text: Out of the many MTG locations I've been to in the past 7 years, this one takes the cake.  Friendly atmosphere, varied selection, and a great owner make this establishment truly top-notch.

name: Ronald Brock
text: Great store, the owner Mark is a great guy and will work with you

name: Fatsu Swagneel
text: If you and 30 friends had OCD you could not organize better than Bud. get rekt noob.

name: Paul Gleaton
text: Great place to game, friendly staff.

name: Steve Uptain
text: Great place for all types of games!

name: FATE Destiny (FATE)
text: The best of the best, with Friday night magic, DND, and lots more.

name: Magic City Game Club
text: Awesome owner and very accommodating. I definitely enjoyed my time and will be returning on a regular basis.

name: Seraphina Croi
text: Great place for all your gaming needs!

name: Dylan Deaton
text: Great for people of all ages

name: Emmerald Sado
text: Really nice people

name: Mark Singleton
text: Has everything you need for gaming

name: Rob Barnett
text: Great Shop ... Great Service...

name: Mid9ight _
text: Awesome place

name: Jen Barber
text: Great in every way

name: Andrew Wakefield
text: Great game and comic shop, friendly staff.

name: Shane DeRossett
text: Nice shop, with friendly staff.

name: Tim Poe
text: Shop is ran well and a lot of improvements being made recently

name: Joshua Brooks
text: Awesome

name: Jill Hill
text: Nice people

name: stella Conatser
text: Great. Loved the people.

name: Aguilar Santy
text: it's awesome

name: Tom Bruno
text: I LOVE THIS STORE!!!!
